reviewText: The DVD case arrived damaged.  The DVD's do not fit well in the case. Very disappointed.  The DVD's are good however.
I am taking it session by session and am very satisfied with results.
This is a great set that gives you invaluable information.  I get so much more watching these kind of lessons in action vs reading about them in a book.
Very good series from foal to young horse.
This is a great DVD set. He explains everything in detail and his methods work great. I couldn't be more happier with my purchase. I would definitely recommend his DVDs to anyone.

Details a lot the same as in his other DVD's but I believe if you learn one new thing it was worth it.  I learned more than one, so it was worth it.  Clinton Anderson teaches in terms you can understand.  Makes it look oh, so, easy!  Thumbs up for this DVD.  ;-)
